title: Oiso, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar UL edge; ULQ, near center
description: travelers bundled up against the rain proceed down a narrow pathway into a village; covered horse at LR; bales of rice at center and L; crisscrossing lines indicating rain throughout; ocean scene with small boats at L
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
